languages.text: "...Ведают звезды, что даровано им будет угаснуть. Ведают миры, что даровано им будет стать прахом с приходом нашим".

traits.locale_text: "...Мертвые звезды погаснут, миры обратятся прахом под нашими ногами".

languages.text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."
languages.original_text: "...Ведают звезды, что даровано им будет угаснуть. Ведают миры, что даровано им будет стать прахом с приходом нашим".

traits.locale_text: "…Stars know that what has been granted to them shall fade. Worlds know that what has been granted to them shall turn to dust under me and mine."
"…Stars know that what has been granted to them shall fade. Worlds know that what has been granted to them shall turn to dust under me and mine."
"...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."
"…Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that it is bestowed upon them to turn to ashes under my feet and ours."
"...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."
"...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

languages.text: «... Las estrellas saben que están condenadas a desvanecerse. Los mundos saben que están abocados a convertirse en cenizas ante nuestra llegada».
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

traits.locale_text: «... Las estrellas saben que están condenadas a desvanecerse. Los mundos saben que están abocados a convertirse en cenizas bajo nuestros pies».

languages.text: « ... Les étoiles savent qu'il leur est permis de s'éteindre. Les mondes savent qu'il leur est permis de se réduire en cendres devant nous. »
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

traits.locale_text: « ... Les étoiles savent qu'il leur est permis de s'éteindre. Les mondes savent qu'il leur est permis de se réduire en cendres sous mes pieds et les nôtres. »

languages.text: 「…星々は消滅する名誉を知る。世界は我々の訪れで灰になることを知る」
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

traits.locale_text: 「…星々は消滅する名誉を知る。世界は我々の訪れで灰になることを知る」

languages.text: “……群星知道，消逝便是他们的使命。无数世界知道，被我们化成灰烬便是他们的使命。”
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

traits.locale_text: “……群星知道，消逝便是他们的使命。无数世界知道，在我们脚下化为灰烬，便是他们的使命。”

languages.text: "... Sterne wissen, dass es ihnen gegeben ist, zu verblassen. Welten wissen, dass es ihnen gegeben ist, durch unser Erscheinen zu Asche zu zerfallen."
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."

traits.locale_text: "... Sterne wissen, dass es ihnen gegeben ist, zu verblassen. Welten wissen, dass es ihnen gegeben ist, unter meinen Füßen und den Euren zu Asche zu werden."

languages.text: "...Yıldızlar biliyor ki kaderlerine bu yazılmış. Dünyalar biliyor ki gelişimiz ile birlikte küle dönmek var kaderlerinde."
languages.original_text: "...Stars know that it is bestowed upon them to fade. Worlds know that is bestowed upon them to turn to ash at our coming."
